Uses of Interface
com.bitplan.simplegraph.core.SimpleGraph

  • Packages that use SimpleGraph 
    Package Description
    com.bitplan.simplegraph.core  
    com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl  

    • Uses of SimpleGraph in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core

      Subinterfaces of SimpleGraph in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SimpleNode
      The SimpleNode interface represents a Vertex in a graph https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vertex_(graph_theory) it wraps an Apache TinkerPop vertex
      interface  SimpleSystem
      a System that allows access to a graph that is wrapped by the system

    • Uses of SimpleGraph in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl

      Classes in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl that implement SimpleGraph 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleGraphImpl
      default implementation of SimpleGraph interface - wraps a TinkerPop 3 graph
      class  SimpleNodeImpl
      default implementation of a SimpleNode wraps a Tinkerpop/Gremlin Vertex
      class  SimpleSystemImpl
      implementation of a simple System that is to be wrapped to be handled using Apache TinkerPop3 hiding some of the complexity
      Fields in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl declared as SimpleGraph 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SimpleGraph SimpleNodeImpl.simpleGraph 
      Methods in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl that return SimpleGraph 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleGraph SimpleNodeImpl.getSimpleGraph()
      get my simple graph
      Constructors in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl with parameters of type SimpleGraph 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleGraphImpl(SimpleGraph simpleGraph)
      construct me from the given simple Graph
      SimpleNodeImpl(SimpleGraph simpleGraph, String kind, String... keys)
      initialize me for the given graph
      SimpleSystemImpl(SimpleGraph graph)
